description: An operation provides the base for Hypermedia as the Engine of Application State
title: Operation Schema Version 2018-03-01

___href.description: Hyperlink to the resource. This key name is borrowed from the HTML `href` element and behaves similarly.

___method.description: Default is GET -  (GET, HEAD, POST, PUT, DELETE, CONNECT, OPTIONS, TRACE) + RFC 5789 PATCH method.

___rel.description: Relation type as defined by the server. There are registered relation types listed in [RFC 5988 6.2.2. Initial Registry Contents](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc5988#section-6.2.2) including pagination relation types of `next`, `prev`, `first` and `last`.
